g:HTMLPanel.p: This section will show you how to quickly build a new YUIGWT application so you can start playing with YUI in Java by yourself.

We will use YUI files directly from YUI CDN because it is easier. In a later section we will show you also how to include the entire YUI build inside your own application so you can serve all YUI files entirely from your server instead having to be connected to internet for you application to work.
